title: Bloomberg Markets: Llamas on Apple Introducing HomePod
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Llamas on Apple Introducing HomePod
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ramon Llamas Research Manager for Wearables and Mobile Phones International Data Corp Discussing Apple's first major new product in two years, the HomePod voice-controlled speaker.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
